channel.title: Basic, BASIC script request
channel.description:
I need a script to follow the color black, but not include the sides and bottoms (since they are black)
heres a picture of what i mean
[img]http://img479.imageshack.us/img479/7036/untitled1fo6.png[/img]
But I only want it to follow the black circle, so it must not follow anything outside of this red rectangle in the next picture
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/9987/untitled2af9.png[/img]
It probably would be simple :P

item.title: Basic, BASIC script request
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

can you tell me where this game is located for reference/testing?

Heres the script. I just need the actual game so I can input the window size.

[code]program thingy;

var
x,y:integer;

procedure follow;
begin
FindColorTolerance(x,y,0,x1,y1,x2,y2,10))
MoveMouse(x,135);
Wait(10);
end;

begin
repeat
follow;
until(isFkeydown(12));
end.[/code]

F12 to stop, or ctrl+alt+s

Read full topic
